column2: Cultural Advancements
Blackreach Trade
My liege, we found a deep cave that might lead to riches, would you like to gather adventurers to send them to depths?
Gather them.
This might kill them. Don't gather anyone.
Adventurers gathered, my liege. Are you sure that you want to send them beneath?
Lets see how the caves can benefit us.
I've changed my mind. Get the money back and send them home.
Horrible news! Nobody heard from your adventurers that went to cave. Probably they died inside the cave…
Damn.
My liege! Some of the adventurers came back. They got have some gold back from their quest but it doesn't even pay for our expenses.
I don't know what I expected.
My liege! Adventurers are back from Blackreach with lots of gold!
Not as much as I'd like but… all right.
My liege! Adventurers are back from Blackreach with lots of gold and some Dwemer artifacts! These might help us develop our country!
Its worth it… I think?
My liege! Adventurers are back from Blackreach with great treasures and some Dwemer artifacts! These might help us develop our country!
Awesome.
My liege! Adventurers found a good place to camp, now that place is turned into a little settlement with a mining team! They are sending us ores and Dwemer artifacts every day!
Is this a dream?
